title: Beat Yas in lane, Yas roams, I ping and try to follow, but I'm slow AF
body:
Team (including bot) pins loss on me when Yas gets fed on bot lane and Yi.
{{champion:45}} "4/6 Jinx, 0/6 Thresh, 1/4 Yi and you're pinning this loss on ME?! We all suck, including you and me. " 
{{champion:222}} "we suck bc u fed yas u dumb"
{{champion:157}}* 1/3 until he started roaming.*
